desc: Continuing backend development with a focus on building scalable and efficient APIs using Node.js, Express.js, and TypeScript. Enhanced database operations with TypeORM, working with both MongoDB and PostgreSQL. Utilized Redis for caching to improve application performance.

Worked on backend development using Node.js, Express.js, and TypeScript. Handled database management with TypeORM, integrating both MongoDB and PostgreSQL for data storage. Contributed to server-side rendering using Handlebars for dynamic web pages.
